explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a model (SDP-BGRU) for relation extraction, which is a machine learning task.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper treats enterprise relations extraction as a classification problem, which is a supervised learning task.
explanations.classification: The paper explicitly mentions treating enterprise relations extraction as a classification problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The model uses support vector machines as a classifier.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is used in the model.
explanations.neural network: The model uses Bidirectional Gated Recurrent Unit (BGRU) networks, which are a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The use of BGRU networks indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.representation learning: The model obtains feature vectors through BGRU networks, which involves learning representations of the input data.
explanations.recurrent neural network: BGRU is a type of recurrent neural network.
explanations.long short-term memory: Gated Recurrent Units (GRUs) are related to LSTM networks, both being types of recurrent neural networks with gating mechanisms.
explanations.LSTM: GRUs are similar to LSTMs in their purpose and functionality, though they have different architectures.
